activities: Gallup receives HR and personal data of employees, employee applicants, customers and other data from client companies for which we have a contractual relationship for research and consulting services.  Gallup also receives HR and personal data regarding our employees and applicants for employment related purposes and services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom

recoursemech:
JAMS Safe Harbor Program;
